## ciliumctl endpoint get

Display endpoint information

```
ciliumctl endpoint get ( <endpoint identifier> | -l <endpoint labels> )  [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  ciliumctl endpoint get 4598
  ciliumctl endpoint get pod-name:default:foobar
  ciliumctl endpoint get -l id.baz
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for get
  -l, --labels strings   list of labels
  -o, --output string    json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

* [ciliumctl endpoint](ciliumctl_endpoint.md)	 - Manage endpoints
